name: tailwindcss-classes
description: A list of all TailwindCSS classes
author: David HÃ©rault <dherault@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dherault)

scripts.patch: npm version patch && git add . -A && git commit -m "[tailwindcss-classes] Publish patch" && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor && git add . -A && git commit -m "[tailwindcss-classes] Publish minor" && npm publish
